entries.title: "Let it Rot" - China's Youth are Giving Up on Life
entries.description:
Get Cultivate for free and see where your Amazon products come from, find out who and where you're actually buying from. Free Download - https://www.wecultivate.us/get/extension/current?campaignId=wins 

You may have heard of Lying Flat or Bai Lan or "Let it Rot", what is happening to the youth of China today?...

For a deeper dive into China's Propaganda influence and soft power, watch The China Show: https://www.youtube.com/advpodcasts

Support Sasha and I on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/serpentza

For Motorcycle adventures around the world, and a talk-show on two wheels go to ADVChina every Monday 1pm EST
https://www.youtube.com/advchina

For a realistic perspective on China and world travel from an American father and a Chinese mother with two half-Chinese daughters go to Laowhy86 every Wednesday 1pm EST
https://youtu.be/mErixa-YIJE

For a no-nonsense on the street look at Chinese culture and beyond from China's original YouTuber, join SerpentZA on Friday at 1pm EST
https://www.youtube.com/serpentza
